lesson.title: Addition and Subtraction Practice
lesson.overview: This lesson focuses on improving number sense through addition and subtraction exercises, including both computation and word problems.

introduction.description: Introduce addition and subtraction with examples that demonstrate carrying and borrowing.
instructions: Explain how to align numbers by place value.
Demonstrate addition and subtraction with visual aids.

activity.description: Students will complete a series of addition and subtraction problems, including word problems to apply their skills in realistic contexts.
instructions: Solve the problems on the worksheet.
Show your work for word problems.
Use the space provided for calculations.

teacherIntroduction.script: Today we're going to practice addition and subtraction. Remember to line up your numbers by place value and take your time reading the word problems.

whiteboardExamples.content: A word problem: If you have 23 apples and you buy 15 more, how many apples do you have now?

studentProblems.problem: A word problem: Sara has 45 candies. She gives 12 to her friend. How many does she have left?
A word problem: Tom sees 34 birds. 9 fly away. How many birds are left?
A word problem: You have 22 books. You buy 15 more. How many books do you have?

worksheet.title: Addition and Subtraction Practice - Grade 2
worksheet.instructions: Solve the problems below. Show your work for the word problems.

content.text: Sara has 45 candies. She gives 12 to her friend. How many does she have left? ___
Tom sees 34 birds. 9 fly away. How many birds are left? ___
You have 22 books. You buy 15 more. How many books do you have? ___

accommodations: Use of manipulatives for visual aid

worksheet.title: Addition and Subtraction Practice - Grade 3
worksheet.instructions: Solve the problems below. Show your work for the word problems.

content.text: Sara has 45 candies. She gives 12 to her friend. How many does she have left? ___
Tom sees 34 birds. 9 fly away. How many birds are left? ___
You have 22 books. You buy 15 more. How many books do you have? ___

worksheet.title: Addition and Subtraction Practice - Grade 5
worksheet.instructions: Solve the problems below. Show your work for the word problems.

content.text: You have 345 marbles. You give 123 to a friend. How many marbles do you have left? ___
A train has 234 passengers. 87 get off at the next stop. How many are left? ___
You have 150 stickers. You buy 75 more. How many stickers do you have now? ___

accommodations: Allow use of calculators for checking work
